Module com.example.schedulesoft
Package com.example.schedulesoft.auth

Class SessionHolder

java.lang.Object
com.example.schedulesoft.auth.SessionHolder
public class SessionHolder extends Object
Class that holds a user session. The purpose of this class is to hold and clear a user session.
